skillTree.name: Haeyndrik's Shield
skillTree.description: The god of money, wealth and power protects it's patrons with a shield of coins.

skillTree.name: Empire Warhorse
skillTree.description: The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.

skillTree.name: Goldilock
skillTree.description: Goldilock is the personal companion of the Arch-Priest of Haeyndrik, it's rider is said to be forever lucky in his endeavors.

skillTree.name: Simon's Spy Glass
skillTree.description: ''You can mock me with fakery, Peasant? I can smell carat in Gold bars and Jewelry from miles!''

skillTree.name: Eye for Profit
skillTree.description: Simon requires no aid to judge the worth of a commodity, it comes as natural as breathing to him.

skillTree.name: The Capital Defended
skillTree.description: The Cult of Haeyndrik has no official knightly order, yet nothing comes as close as the Defenders of the Capital. A group of convoy guardians dating back from the times of Saint De Teuling.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +8 for Defenders of the Capital (Greatswords)
	(Lord's army)
Capacity: +2 for Defenders of the Capital (Greatswords)

skillTree.name: Patron of De Teuling
skillTree.description: De Teuling was one of the first merchants known to the Old World and a Saint for the Cult, these cavalry warriors bare her name - long may it live on.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -75% for De Teuling's Escort (Empire Knights - Greatswords)
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -75% for Defenders of the Capital (Greatswords)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Prayer to Haeyndrik
skillTree.description: People pray to Haeyndrik to bless their transactions, binding all parties to their agreements, even if that agreements forces them to lower arms.

skillTree.name: Tax Exemption
skillTree.description: ''No no no.. You're doing it all wrong. It's all about the right diversion between wealth and property tax. Here, let me help''.

skillTree.name: Wasteland Import-Export Exchange
skillTree.description: Goudenkruin always strolls with the most exotic and fine wares available. Lords and heroes looking to keep up with the latest Cathayan trends tend to take note when Simon uses his contacts.

effects.description:
Golden Idols resource production: 10 chests
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Burgher Acquisition
skillTree.description: Simon pleads with his God to make sure that there will be a local merchant willing to deal with him. The prospect of profit envigorates his devotees.

skillTree.name: Temple of Haeyndrik
skillTree.description: Every city that houses a temple of Haeyndrik prospers. Or every Temple of Haeyndriks prospers.. One or the other.

skillTree.name: Bought Loyalty
skillTree.description: The most susceptible for Haeyndrik's appeal are those ambitious of power, money and influence. They would offer their gold to the power of wealth for the chance alone of seeing it doubled. One of his loyal devotees is Pieter de Groot, who aspires to become the richest known to man one day.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -35 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Word of Mouth
skillTree.description: Prayers cause Goudenkruin's competitors and allies to speak well of him. All characters within range talk well of their past dealings with him, no matter how bad they may have been. It allows him to speak with the tongue of Haenydrik himself, drowning enemies in gold and coin with the mere words he speaks.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Peddlers Luck
skillTree.description: Goudenkruin would often mutter prayers to the Merchant God and every transaction seems to go your way. This luck translates to the battlefield, where blows simply brush off the Arch-Priest

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 7% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 11% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 15% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Free Company Militia, Privateers, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Riverwardens, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh, Landship and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Headhunter
skillTree.description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

backgroundSkills.name: Haeyndrik's Profit
backgroundSkills.description: "Money, power, and influence—these are my Gods. And Haeyndrik represents all that is money, power, and influence."

effects.description:
Income from trade-good producing buildings: +50%
	(local province)
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +35%

items.name: Gerardus Hondschoen
items.description: Brother Gerardus Hondschoen has always enjoyed a challenge - ever since he was a lad in Suiddock, stealing to support his mother, he's relished going into places he shouldn't, taking things that weren't his and doing his best to embarrass the rich and powerful. A locked safe is like tossing down the glove to him, a duel between him and the locksmith. A greedy landlord is someone just begging to have a chamber pot emptied on his head. Gerardus believes Simon Goudenkruin is the key to wealth, using his patrons as willing victims.
